channel.title: [PI] I need working EXP lamps
channel.description:
So I have exp lamps on my server, I'm currently using InsidiaX's source, and their lamp only gives dungeoneering exp. I've searched, and only rune-server has any tutorials, all of which just negate the lamp from working, that or I'm doing it wrong...
Could someone please tell me how to make exp lamps give exp in a skill you choose?
ANY help is SERIOUSLY appreciated, Thank you,
-Micah

item.title: [PI] I need working EXP lamps
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

He wants to be able to choose a skill and get exp in the chosen skill, not just 1

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] I need working EXP lamps
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

go to clickitem.java. and search this.

if(itemId == 4447) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(3000, 24); c.sendMessage("You rub the lamp and are raped by dungeoneering."); c.getItems().deleteItem(4447, 1); }

Change the red number (24), to the skill id of your choosing.

Read full topic
